Left W.S. middle inner forearm block

Left W.S. rising block, reverse punch

Left W.S. middle inner forearm block

yellow-stripe.english: W.S. middle inner forearm block, reverse punch
yellow-stripe.korean: Gunnon sogi-kaunde an palmok, makgi, bandae jirugi

yellow-stripe.english: W.S. outer forearm low block, reverse punch
yellow-stripe.korean: Najunde baket palmok makgi, bandae jirugi

yellow.english: W.S. outer forearm high block, reverse middle punch
yellow.korean: Gunnon sogi-bakat palmok nopunde makgi, bandae jirugi

green-stripe.english: Right Turning kick, L.S. guarding block
green-stripe.korean: Dollyo chagi, niunja sogi-polmok daebi makgi

green-stripe.english: Back Piercing kick, L.S. guarding block
green-stripe.korean: Dwit cha jirugi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

green-stripe.english: Bending stance, side kick, L.S. guarding block
green-stripe.korean: Guburyo junbi sogi A-yop chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

green.english: Left W.S. Palm high hooking block, hooking block, obverse punch
green.korean: Gunnon sogi, Sonbadak nopunde golcho makgi, golcho makgi, baro jirugi

green.english: W.S. X fist pressing block, twin vertical punch
green.korean: Gunnon sogi-kyocha joomuk noollo makgi, Sang sewo jirugi

blue-stripe.english: Left Low stance. Palm pressing block
L.S. Knifehand guarding block, footshift to W.S. upper elbow strike
blue-stripe.korean: Niunja sogi-sonkal daebi makgi, jajun bal, gunnon sogi-wi palkup taerigi

blue-stripe.english: L.S. Double step, knifehand guarding block. (Change stance)
blue-stripe.korean: Ibo omgyo didigi Niunja sogi-sonkal daebi makgi

blue-stripe.english: Reverse turning kick then perform a L.S. forearm guarding block
blue-stripe.korean: Bandae dollyo chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: Moving on left leg, Sitting stance W shape block
Downward kick then perform a L.S. guarding block
blue.korean: Naeryo chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: L.S. Low knifehand block, footshift, W.S. circular block
blue.korean: Niunja sogi-najunde sonkal makgi, jajun bal, gunnon sogi-dollimyo makgi

blue.english: Sidekick, Back kick, W.S. reverse punch, footshift, guarding block
blue.korean: Yop cha Jirugi, Dwitcha Jirugi, gunnon sogi-bandae jirugi, jajun bal, palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: Turningkick, reverse turningkick, W.S. rev knifehand high rev strike
blue.korean: Guard Dollyo chagi, bandae dollyo chagi, gunnon sogi-sonkal dung nopunde taerigi, jajun bal, palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: L.S. Side backfist and a low outer forearm block
blue.korean: Niunja sogi-yop dung joomuk, najunde bakat palmok makgi

red-stripe.english: From Rt. L.S. Guarding block. Frontkick off front leg, turningkick off the rear leg
Sliding into- Fixed stance side punch, then pull back into Vertical stance downward knifehand strike
red-stripe.korean: Mikulgi-gojong sogi-yop jirugi, soojik sogi-naeryo sonkal taerigi

red-stripe.english: W.S. punch, grab hand, release with sidekick, perform L.S. knifehand strike
red-stripe.korean: Gunnon sogi-baro jirugi, jappyolsol tae, yop chagi, niunja sogi-sonkal taerigi

red-stripe.english: Front leg, hookingkick - sidekick, then using back leg, cresentkick-sidekick, L.S. guarding block
red-stripe.korean: Golcho chagi, yop chagi, bandal chagi, yop chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

red-stripe.english: Double step sidekick. To change stance perform a single step
Double step turningkick. To change stance perform a single step

red.english: Rt.LS. Guarding block, hookingkick-sidekick off the front leg, reverse turning hooking, kick off the back
red.korean: Golcho chagi, yop chagi, bandae dollyo goro chagi

red.english: WS. Knifehand high front strike bringing backhand in front of head
Flying sidekick in a double stepping motion, execute a knife hand guarding block

red.english: LS. X knifehand middle checking block
Turningkick, then reverse turningkick - turningkick on the same leg
red.korean: Dollyo chagi, bandae dollyo chagi, dollyo chagi

red.english: LS. Guarding block, double step hookingkick off the front leg. To change stance perform, a single step
red.korean: Ibo omgyo didigi, bandae dollyo goro chagi

red.english: SS. Middle front outer forearm block and then a high side backfist
red.korean: Annun sogi-kaunde ap bakat palmok makgi, nopunde yop dung joomuk

red.english: Frontkick - downwardkick on the same leg
Flying frontkick off the back leg
